<!-- source-hash: 428e6a7a3d3fdba475d52c7554293732 -->
A Spring component that maps between internal API data transfer objects and external REST response objects for audit logging functionality.

## Key Components

- **toLogResponse()** - Converts `LogEvent` to `LogResponse` for individual log entries
- **toLogsResponse()** - Maps `GenericQueryResult<LogEvent>` to paginated `LogsResponse` 
- **toLogFilterResponse()** - Transforms `LogFilters` to `LogFilterResponse` with organization data
- **toLogFilterOptions()** - Converts external `LogFilterCriteria` to internal `LogFilterOptions`
- **toLogDetailsResponse()** - Maps detailed `LogDetails` to `LogDetailsResponse` with full content

## Usage Example

```java
@Autowired
private LogMapper logMapper;

// Convert single log event
LogEvent event = getLogEventFromService();
LogResponse response = logMapper.toLogResponse(event);

// Convert paginated results
GenericQueryResult<LogEvent> queryResult = logService.getLogs(filters);
LogsResponse logsResponse = logMapper.toLogsResponse(queryResult);

// Convert filter criteria for internal use
LogFilterCriteria externalCriteria = getFromRequest();
LogFilterOptions internalOptions = logMapper.toLogFilterOptions(externalCriteria);

// Get detailed log with full content
LogDetails details = logService.getLogDetails(eventId);
LogDetailsResponse detailsResponse = logMapper.toLogDetailsResponse(details);
```

The mapper handles null safety and extends `BaseRestMapper` for common pagination mapping functionality. All transformations use the builder pattern for clean object construction.
